dt: {bc}a matter that is in dispute between two or more parties

dt.t: {ldquo}… He insists that this was an {wi}issue{/wi} over health care policy, not over the former vice president's age or agility. …{rdquo}
They misquoted me, but I didn't want to {phrase}make an issue of{/phrase} it.

dt: {bc}the point at which an unsettled matter is ready for a decision
{bc}the thing or the whole quantity of things given out at one time
{bc}the act of publishing or officially giving out or making available
{bc}a discharge (as of blood) from the body
{bc}a means or place of going out {bc}{sx|exit||}, {sx|outlet||}
{bc}the action of going, coming, or flowing out {bc}{sx|egress||}, {sx|emergence||}
{bc}something coming forth from a specified source
{bc}a final outcome that usually constitutes a solution (as of a problem) or resolution (as of a difficulty)
{bc}a final conclusion or decision about something arrived at after consideration

dt.t: hope that his enterprise would have a prosperous {wi}issue{/wi}

dt: {bc}proceeds from a source of revenue (such as an estate)

et: Middle English, exit, proceeds, from Anglo-French, from {it}issir{/it} to come out, go out, from Latin {it}exire{/it} to go out, from {it}ex-{/it} + {it}ire{/it} to go; akin to Goth {it}iddja{/it} he went, Greek {it}ienai{/it} to go, Sanskrit {it}eti{/it} he goes
shortdef: a matter that is in dispute between two or more parties

meta.id: make an early night of it
stems: make an early night of it

hwi.hw: make an early night of it

dt: {bc}to go home or go to bed early

dt.t: With a big meeting tomorrow, I need to {it}make an early night of it{/it}.

shortdef: to go home or go to bed early
